controller

Class Check

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Check

  • public class Check
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the functions that check the movements.
    Author:
    Paolo D'Arienzo VR376656, Serena Cavaletti VR364691

    • Method Detail

      • selectCheck

        public static boolean selectCheck(Board scacchiera,
                  Pedine pedina,
                  int newX,
                  int newY)
        Select the right function to call, depending on the piece type of the pedine.
        Parameters:
        scacchiera - Matrix on which working
        pedina - Pedine to move
        newX - New coordinate x of the pedine
        newY - New coordinate y of the pedine
        Returns:
        Return the result of the proper function, associated with the pedine, which says if the movement is allowed

      • pawn

        public static boolean pawn(Board scacchiera,
           Pedine pawn,
           int newX,
           int newY)
        Function that checks if the pawn is allowed to move.
        Parameters:
        scacchiera - Matrix on which working
        pawn - Pedine to move, in this function is always the pawn
        newX - New coordinate x of the pedine
        newY - New coordinate y of the pedine
        Returns:
        Return if the movement of that pawn is allowed

      • check

        public static boolean check(Board scacchiera,
            Pedine pedinaMossa,
            int newX,
            int newY)
        Function that checks if the movement of a pedine doesn't jeopardize the same side's king.
        Parameters:
        scacchiera - Matrix on which working
        pedinaMossa - Pedine which movement has to be controlled
        newX - Coordinate x target
        newY - Coordinate y target
        Returns:
        Return if the move is allowed or not

      • setCheck

        public static void setCheck(Board scacchiera,
            Pedine pedinaMossa)
        Set the check variable of board.
        Parameters:
        scacchiera - Matrix which I am working on
        pedinaMossa - Pedine that just moved

      • checkmate

             Colour myColour)
        Set the checkmate variable of board.
        Parameters:
        scacchiera - Matrix which I am working on
        myColour - I used the colour for having some references (me, enemy)
